item.title: Blues Rock playlist for 9/2017
item.description: Including: Bo Diddley (Rip), End Of Me, Eric Clapton With Jj Cale, Groundhogs, Joe Bonamassa, Mountainwolf, Robin Trower, The Black Wizards, The Heavy Eyes, Walking Papers.

item.title: Blues Rock playlist for 8/2017
item.description: Including: #238: Action Kick Johnny, Emily Wolfe, Five Horse Johnson, Jeff Beck Hd, Lionize, Old School Now, Radio Moscow, The White Stripes, Zz Ward, Æsc & Embla.

item.title: Blues Rock playlist for 7/2017
item.description: Including: B.B. King, Buddy Guy, Dire Straits, Eric Clapton, Gary Clark Jr., Jimi Hendrix, Patrick Sweany, R.L. Burnside, Radio Moscow, [Live] Johnny Winter.

item.title: Blues Rock playlist for 6/2017
item.description: Including: Aska, Black Pistol Fire, Champagne & Reefer, Cream, Gloria, Left Lane Cruiser, Neil Young, Peter Green, Pretty Fool, The Black Keys.

item.title: Blues Rock playlist for 5/2017
item.description: Including: Bb King & U2, Black Pistol Fire, Blackberry Smoke, Charles Bradley, Highly Suspect, Jimi Hendrix, Left Lane Cruiser, Meek Mill, Muddy Waters, Stonefield.

item.title: Blues Rock playlist for 4/2017
item.description: Including: Dead Meadow, Led Zeppelin, Muddy Waters, Radio Moscow, Robben Ford, The 77'S, The Beautiful Girls, The Blackwater Fever, The Cruel Sea, The White Stripes.

item.title: Blues Rock playlist for 3/2017
item.description: Including: "Holy Papa", Gary Clark Jr, Jack White, Jj Grey And Mofro, Jonny Lang, Led Zeppelin, Rory Gallagher, Seasick Steve, Tedeschi Trucks Band, The Black Keys.

item.title: Blues Rock playlist for 2/2017
item.description: Including: "Goin' Down", Cold Water, Henry'S Funeral Shoe, Interim, Kurt Vile, Reignwolf, Rory Gallagher & His Band, Shotgun Blues, Slow Season, Trouble County.

item.title: Blues Rock playlist for 1/2017
item.description: Including: Big Wreck, Ennio Morricone, Eric Clapton 70, Interim, Jeff Beck, Jonathan Coulton, Led Zeppelin, Lookout Joe, Low Fall, Savoy Brown.
